Meetings will begin at 6:00 P.M., and continue until adjournment at 11:00 P.M.

November 12, 2026

December 17, 2026

In accordance with statute requirements of the Open Public Meetings Act, C.10:4-8(d), listed above  are the regularly scheduled meetings of the Zoning Board of Adjustment of the Township of Woodbridge for the year 2026. All meetings will be held in Council Chambers of the Memorial Municipal Building, 1 Main St., Woodbridge, New Jersey, unless publicized to be held at another location. Formal action may be taken at these meetings.

Special meetings of the Zoning Board will be scheduled at the call of the Chairman.  Adequate notice of these meetings will be provided in accordance with the requirements of the New Jersey Open Public Meetings Act.

Agendas are available prior to the meetings.

* Brij K. Sharma, 2nd Alternate                Term January 1, 2025 to December 31, 2026


Current and prospective members as well as alternates are required to take 5 hours of training through a basic course in land use law and planning (P.L. 2005, ch. 133).
